key.name: recentfunctions
key.description: The function selector keeps a list of recently used functions. This is that list.

key.name: num-of-recent
key.summary: Maximum Length of Recently Used Functions List
key.description: The function selector keeps a list of recently used functions. This is the maximum length of that list.

key.name: init-caps
key.description: This variable determines whether to autocorrect initial caps

key.name: init-caps-list
key.description: The autocorrect engine does not correct the initial caps for words in this list.

key.name: first-letter
key.description: This variable determines whether to autocorrect first letters

key.name: first-letter-list
key.description: The autocorrect engine does not capitalize the first letter of words following strings in this list.

key.name: names-of-days
key.description: This variable determines whether to autocorrect names of days

key.name: replace
key.description: Autocorrect replace

key.name: activate-newplugins
key.description: This variable determines whether to activate every new encountered plugin.

key.name: active
key.description: This list contains all plugins that are supposed to be automatically activated.

key.name: known
key.description: This list contains all known plugins.

key.name: file-states
key.description: This list contains all plugin file states.

key.name: extra-dirs
key.description: This list contains all extra directories containing plugins.

key.name: extra-dirs
key.description: This list contains all extra directories containing autoformat templates.

key.name: sys-dir
key.description: This directory contains the pre-installed autoformat templates.

key.name: usr-dir
key.description: The main directory for user specific autoformat templates.

key.name: all-sheets
key.description: This value determines whether by default the print set-up dialog applies to all sheets simultaneously.

key.name: gtk-setting
key.description: The configuration of GTKPrintSetting. Do not edit this variable.

key.name: header
key.description: The default page header for new documents that can be modified using the page setup dialog.

key.name: footer
key.description: The default page footer for new documents that can be modified using the page setup dialog.

key.name: hf-font-size
key.description: The default font size for headers and footers.

key.name: hf-font-name
key.description: The default font name for headers and footers.

key.name: hf-font-bold
key.summary: The default header/footer font is bold.
key.description: This value determines whether the default font for headers and footers is bold.

key.name: hf-font-italic
key.summary: The default header/footer font is italic.
key.description: This value determines whether the default font for headers and footers is italic.

key.name: center-horizontally
key.description: This value determines whether the default setting in the Print Setup dialog is to center pages horizontally.

key.name: center-vertically
key.description: This value determines whether the default setting in the Print Setup dialog is to center pages vertically.

key.name: print-grid-lines
key.description: This value determines the default setting in the Print Setup dialog whether print grid lines. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: print-even-if-only-styles
key.summary: Default Print Cells with Only Styles
key.description: This value determines the default setting in the Print Setup dialog whether to print empty but formatted cells. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: print-black-n-white
key.description: This value determines the default setting in the Print Setup dialog whether to print in only black and white. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: print-titles
key.description: This value determines the default setting in the Print Setup dialog whether to print row and column headers. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: across-then-down
key.description: This value determines the default setting in the Print Setup dialog whether to print first right then down. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: scale-percentage
key.description: This value determines the default setting in the Print Setup dialog whether to scale pages by a given percentage. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: scale-percentage-value
key.description: This value gives the percentage by which to scale each printed page. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: scale-width
key.description: This value determines the maximum number of pages that make up the width of a printout of the current sheet. The sheet will be reduced to fit within this width. This value can be changed in the Page Setup dialog.

key.name: scale-height
key.description: This value determines the maximum number of pages that make up the height of a printout of the current sheet. The sheet will be reduced to fit within this height. This value can be changed in the Page Setup dialog.

key.name: repeat-top
key.description: This string gives the default region to be repeated at the top of each printed sheet. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: repeat-left
key.description: This string gives the default region to be repeated at the left of each printed sheet. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: preferred-unit
key.description: This string gives the default unit to be used in the page setup dialog.

key.name: margin-top
key.description: This value gives the default number of points from the top of a page to the start of the body. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: margin-bottom
key.description: This value gives the default number of points from the bottom of a page to the end of the body. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: margin-gtk-bottom
key.description: This value gives the default number of points from the bottom of a page to the end of the footer. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: margin-gtk-top
key.description: This value gives the default number of points from the top of a page to the top of the header. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: margin-gtk-left
key.description: This value gives the default number of points from the left of a page to the left of the body. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: margin-gtk-right
key.description: This value gives the default number of points from the right of a page to the right of the body. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: paper
key.description: This is the default paper specification. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: paper-orientation
key.description: This is the default paper orientation. Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: hf-left
key.description: Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: hf-middle
key.description: Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: hf-right
key.description: Please use the Print Setup dialog to edit this value.

key.name: unfocused
key.description: Some dialogs contain only a single entry field that allows range selections in the workbook. Setting this variable to TRUE directs selections to this entry even if the entry does not have keyboard focus.

key.name: stringindicator
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: separator
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: terminator
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: locale
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: encoding
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: quoting
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: format
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: transliteration
key.description: Please use the Text Export dialog to edit this value.

key.name: ignore-case
key.description: Search & Replace ignores case as default

key.name: preserve-case
key.description: Search & Replace preserves case as default

key.name: query
key.description: Search & Replace poses query before each change as default

key.name: whole-words-only
key.description: Search & Replace replaces whole words only as default

key.name: scope
key.description: This is the default scope of Search & Replace. 0: entire workbook; 1: current sheet; 2: range

key.name: change-cell-strings
key.description: Search & Replace changes cells containing strings as default

key.name: change-cell-expressions
key.description: Search & Replace changes cells containing expressions as default

key.name: change-cell-other
key.description: Search & Replace changes cells containing other values as default

key.name: change-comments
key.description: Search & Replace changes comments as default

key.name: search-results
key.description: Search searches in results as default

key.name: keep-strings
key.summary: Search & Replace Keeps Strings as Strings
key.description: Search & Replace keeps strings as strings even if they look like numbers as default

key.name: regex
key.description: This value determines the input type for Search & Replace. 0: text; 1: regular expression; 2: number

key.name: columnmajor
key.description: Search & Replace proceeds in column major order as default

key.name: error-behaviour
key.description: This is the default error behavior of Search & Replace indicated by an integer from 0 to 4.
